Detailed Description

The window management interface of Omicron.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum omi::window::WindowMode

Defines the different modes a window can be in.

Enumerator
kModeWindowed 

The window is a standard window with borders.

kModeBorderless 

A window without standard operating system provided borders.

kModeFullscreen 

A window without borders and also occupies the entire screen.
